source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening
source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.

items.title: How to Grow a Medicinal Food Forest
items.headline: Discover how to create a beautiful, diverse, high-yield, permaculture-style garden that mimics a forest ecosystem.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to turn your own back yard into a food forest. You will learn practical hands on skills like site preparation, soil amending, and planting specifics. In addition you will gain an extensive understanding of the history of food forests.

items.title: Woodworking: Make Quality Doors

visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America
visible_instructors.name: George
visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska

items.headline: This extensive door making course will help improve you build quality doors for your next project.
objectives_summary: This woodworking course provides many important tips to help you build doors that last.
How to use your router table to make frame and panel doors.
How to make a variety of doors from small scare, bead board, cathedral and more.

items.title: Feng Shui Level 1

visible_instructors.job_title: Design, Staging and Feng Shui Consultant
visible_instructors.name: Thea
visible_instructors.title: Thea Cosma

items.headline: Welcome to the realm of Feng Shui
objectives_summary: You will learn the fundamentals and principles of Feng Shui. 5 elements theory Introduction to the compass and the Bagua 3 Types of luck Yin and Yang principles Main areas of Health & Wealth and so much more

items.title: Declutter, Simplify, Let Go - Take the Challenge Now

visible_instructors.title: Barry Dennis
visible_instructors.name: Barry
visible_instructors.job_title: De-Clutter, Simplify, Let Go: Take the Challenge Now!

items.headline: 9 Easy ways to Simplify, De-stress and Organize. Feel the peace, ease and joy
objectives_summary: De-Clutter, Simplify, Let Go, Tidy up, Feng shui and be set free. Life is made out of how we use of our time and energy. Yet we spend countless hours and money dealing with stuff, junk, excess that we don't even like! Imagine a life where all of our time, money and energy goes to only the things that really matter: our passions, our relationships, our peace of mind. That's the life waiting for each of us. Let's do this.

items.title: Understanding True Soil Fertility using New NPK Method

visible_instructors.job_title: Regenpreneur & Soil Health Advocate at Soil Learning Center
visible_instructors.name: 'Regen Ray'
visible_instructors.title: 'Regen Ray' Milidoni

visible_instructors.job_title: Soil Learning Center & Farming Secrets Co-Founders
visible_instructors.name: Helen & Hugo
visible_instructors.title: Helen & Hugo Disler

items.headline: Farming Deeper Soil is Better
objectives_summary: Understand how understand soil fertility and soil health
Understand weeds and plant successions that indicates the health of your soil
Soil fertility management - the new NPK

items.title: Home Staging for Beginners -  Is this the career for you?
items.headline: Learn to change your career and find your Ideal Customer for your Home Staging business
objectives_summary: Learn how to home stage a property.
Decide whether this is the career for you.
Open a work from home business.

items.title: The Greatest Kitchen Renovation Guide
items.headline: By Naomi Findlay PhD
objectives_summary: Determine exactly which elements you can splurge on and which ones you can save to add real value to your kitchen without adding unnecessary cost.
Calculate your total budget for your kitchen reno, from cabinetry to window coverings to light switches.
Get everything you need to know to determine which of your kitchen elements you should:  Refresh, Refinish, Replace, or Reinstall.

items.title: Drop Cable TV/Phone carrier, Save w/ free HDTV & streaming
items.headline: Want to explore ways to decrease your landline\wireless\cable bills? We will review many tech solutions
objectives_summary: save money by learning about the new streaming, wireless and HDTV technology in today's marketplace
Educate yourself on what good wi-fi is, learn whether you have the proper surge protection for your expensive electronic/computing devices
Choosing the right HDTV antenna to get up to 55 FREE HDTV channels in your area

items.title: Kill Bed Bugs Like a Pro
items.headline: Taught by a Professional Exterminator
objectives_summary: Inspect for and eliminate bed bugs in your home the way professional exterminators do

items.title: Greywater Reclamation Systems
items.headline: Guide to understanding what a Greywater Reclamation System is and how it operates.
objectives_summary: Understand water usage in this country & the importance of alternative water sources
Understand the difference between Greywater vs Blackwater
Understand, design and build a Greywater Reclamation System

items.title: From the Garden to the Table
items.headline: How to boost nutrition with homegrown food
objectives_summary: Growing food is back in fashion. Community gardens are popping up everywhere. Learn how to boost your nutrition with homegrown food, how to use it in healthy recipes and surprise your friends and family with delicious food straight from your backyard.

items.title: Build 3 Solar Energy Projects

visible_instructors.name: Steve
visible_instructors.title: Steve Maxwell
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn Hands-On How-To Living Skills With Steve

items.headline: Make your own solar generator, solar heating system & solar food dryer
objectives_summary: How to build a solar generator, solar food dryer and solar heating systems

items.title: Grow Your Own Food: Starting Seedlings at Home
items.headline: Learn how to successfully start seeds indoors, care for seedlings and transplant them outside
objectives_summary: Why you should grow your own seedlings at home
How to time your seed starting
Supplies needed for starting seedlings

items.headline: Learn how to convert any room into a fantastic home theater in just one day without breaking the bank
objectives_summary: Convert any room into an awesome home theatre in one day
Choose the right projector
Choose the right screen

items.title: Bonsai for Beginners
items.headline: Introduction to the Art of Bonsai
objectives_summary: Students will learn all aspects of bonsai art with hands on experience starting from choosing plant and planter, planting it and pruning it in unique shape of bonsai, all aspects of maintenance and pest control. Students will be given assignments at the end of each course to test their knowledge on subject of the art of bonsai.

items.title: How to French Shabby Chic Furniture for a Living

visible_instructors.name: Jenny
visible_instructors.title: Jenny Regeling
visible_instructors.job_title: Restorer of Furniture & Creator of Sandi Hands Sanding Glove

items.headline: Learn how to really enjoy making a living by recycling furniture into French Shabby Chic Furnishings & Décor.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will know how & where to search for the right Furniture pieces to refurbish, successfully & professionally refurbish them, market and sell them, & finally build up a successful client base.
